channel.title: Share dashboard with peers with View only permission without query/DB access
channel.description:
I intend to share a dashboard with a few peers, but don't want them to have access to the Dashboard queries/Database/tables/schemas etc.
I am connected to Redshift, but don't see any such permission. Also came across an old post [here](http://discuss.redash.io/t/view-permission-dashboard-first/579), but not sure if there's any such provision in Redash. Currently I'm using Redash 8.0.
Let me know around the same if possible.

item.title: Share dashboard with peers with View only permission without query/DB access
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
The only way to do this is with secret share links. The feature you linked has not been implemented but it’s high on our list.

Read full topic
item.source: Share dashboard with peers with View only permission without query/DB access
